nodes.text: House Farfalla was a noble house. The members of this family ruled over the half-Bothan sentient species dwelling on their planet.

Years before the beginning of the Ruusan campaign, the current Lord Farfalla negotiated with the Jedi envoy Pernicar and was persuaded to let his people join the Galactic Republic. The Lord's son, Valenthyne Farfalla, became a renowned Jedi Master and one of the leaders of the Army of Light.
